!Asamah: You must know which action to use when a Tyrannosaurus tries to cancel a capture skill. When the beast roars, shakes and writhes, the appropriate capture skills to use are kabokula, tapirawa and shabonoba. Watch each action of the Tyrannosaurus carefuly and respond with the correct skill. Remember that using a capture skill consumes both capture stones and MP be sure to prepare enuogh of them both! May Shilen bless your efforts!
